preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry mixing container, add 15.0 g of Calcium Oxide (CaO). 
 2. Gradually add 5.0 g of Cadmium Oxide (CdO) while stirring the mixture gently. 
 3. Introduce 12.0 g of Phosphorus Pentoxide (P2O5) to the mixture and continue stirring until fully blended. 
 4. Slowly add 30.0 g of distilled water to the dry mixture while continuously mixing to form a paste. 
 5. Finally, incorporate 10.0 g of Silica (SiO2) into the paste, ensuring uniform consistency.
